Judul: NASA SWITCHES HOW IT DIVVIES UP TELESCOPE TIME TO REDUCE GENDER BIAS
Abstrak: NASA has changed the way in which reviewers evaluate requests for viewing time on the agency’s space telescopes in an effort to reduce gender and other biases. It now uses a ‘double-blind’ system, in which neither the proposer nor the reviewer knows who the other is
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
Sumber: 11 J U LY 2019 | VOL 571 | NAT U R E | 153
